title: Introduction
content: In this Q&A, Peter answers all your questions around Zone 2 exercise and training. This was originally recorded as an Instagram Live in March 2021.

title: Zone 2 Training
content: Peter discusses the benefits of Zone 2 training, which involves exercising at a low intensity to improve your body's ability to burn fat and increase endurance. He emphasizes the importance of individualizing your training based on your goals and fitness level, and recommends working with a coach or trainer to develop a personalized plan.

title: Resources
content: Peter recommends listening to the episode with Iñigo San Millán, Ph.D. to learn more about Zone 2 training, as well as checking out AMA #19 for information on magnesium supplementation and how to engage with your doctor.
